column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////-Cookie Butter Fruity Pepples (4.5/5): OK let me first say THIS IS NOT ON THE MENU. My cousin really wanted to try the "Fruity Pebbles French toast" but they ONLY make that item on Sundays
column2: so if you want this item it's only available on that day because they get their food order shipments in the day of so it's fresh.
